Name: Hookbots
About the game: Craft bots and battle friends across 14 game modes +99 Ways To Customize Your Bot From knights and dinosaurs, to bounty hunters and space warriors, choose among tons of different bots - each with cool ways to customize it! 14 Game Modes! Hold the Flag, King of the Ring, Robo Bomb, Volleyhook, Baskethook, Hookball, Big Boss, Coin Collector, Team Deathmatch... - phew - and loooooooot more to challenge your friends. Join the Community We’re indie devs & gamers, and would love to include your ideas on Hookbots. Share’em with us. Shields Will Be Broken Jump In and Start Crushing Some Bots!
